meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to communicate effectively.
meanings.sent1: Her communicabilities shone through during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was due to their strong communicabilities.
meanings.sent3: His lack of communicabilities made for some awkward conversations.
meanings.sent4: The communicabilities of the new software made it easy to use.
meanings.sent5: She demonstrated her communicabilities by resolving the conflict peacefully.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something can be communicated or understood.
meanings.sent1: The complexity of the topic affected its communicabilities.
meanings.sent2: The communicabilities of the message were hindered by the poor reception.
meanings.sent3: The communicabilities of the joke were lost in translation.
meanings.sent4: The communicabilities of emotions can be challenging to express.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting had high communicabilities, conveying its message clearly.
